ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: And what will convey to you what the Night of Power is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: How will you know what the Night of Determination is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And what do you know what the Night of Power is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Would that you knew what the Night of Destiny is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And what have you understood, what the Night of Destiny is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And what will make you know what the Night of Al-Qadr is
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And what will make you comprehend what the grand night
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And what shall teach thee what is the Night of Power?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Ah, what will convey unto thee what the Night of Power is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And what will make you comprehend what the Night of Destiny is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And what shall make thee know that which the night of Power is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: And what will show you what is the Night of Ordainment?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And what will explain to thee what the night of power is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And what will make you know what the night of Al-Qadr (Decree) is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: What could let you know what the Night of Honor is!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But what will convey to you what the Night of Decree is?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [97:2] And what will show you, [what] will make known to you, O Muhammad (s), what the Night of Ordainment is? — [intended] to emphasise its great status and to provoke marvel at it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Ah, what will convey unto thee) Muhammad-this is said out of glorification of this night-(what the Night of Power is) what the merit of the Night of Power is!
